productTitle: Craft-Tastic Let’s Learn to Sew – Mini Sewing Kit, Arts and Crafts, Art Supplies, Embroidery Kit for Beginners, Includes Sewing Supplies, Easy-to-Follow Instructions, Arts & Crafts, Ages 7+
text: This says 7+ for age group, my granddaughter is 8 and has a bit of sewing experience. I have sewn all my life, this is definitely not for a beginner. The materials are cheap and you need very sharp scissors to cut thread (which is really embroidery thread, not sewing thread). I was at daughter in laws house and the 4 pair of scissors she had would not cut the felt, not to mention my granddaughter could not push that fat needle through 2 layers of felt! I could barely get the needle through. Certainly not worth the money.
date: Reviewed in the United States on April 7, 2025
title: Not for children!! Cheaply put together kit.
